title: ‘I woke up feeling hungover’: The comedown after winning a Tour de France stage
content:
Messed-up sleep, fighting off sickness, damaged motivation: Michael Woods, Felix Gall, and Tom Pidcock on the highs and lows.

Read the full article at ‘I woke up feeling hungover’: The comedown after winning a Tour de France stage on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
